alert.note: Alert for Columbia; Northumberland; Schuylkill (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 22 at 4:03PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT CENTRAL SCHUYLKILL...EAST CENTRAL NORTHUMBERLAND AND EASTERN COLUMBIA COUNTIES THROUGH 445 PM EDT... At 403 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Berwick to near Minersville. Movement was northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation possible. Locations impacted include... Pottsville, Berwick, Mount Carmel, Shenandoah, Minersville, Mahanoy City, Frackville, St. Clair, Ashland, Port Carbon, Tremont, Girardville, Mifflinville, New Philadelphia, Almedia, Oneida, Grier City-Park Crest, Lavelle, Marlin and Altamont. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
